Text: RE RandomThat is ok I totally blanked until it was too late also I think that if Millie decides she likes my flat than I will have her as a roommate I decided I could not deal with it right then and so I told her she did nto have to worry about it until July however i think she seems really nice and I think it would be fun HAve a great day Ashley on To IMCEANOTESAshleyEMarynickchaseEcom NRONcom cc Subject RE Random OkayIm an idiotI forgot to bring your email address with me to London its saved in my contacts list at work and I cant check my work email from outside locationsaugh Yet again I fail However I had such a good time visiting I think Im going to try to make a quick trip back over this fall when the air fares are a little cheaper That way I could see you and Jessica and Clay I will stick your phone number in my physical address book and be a better visitor next goround Sorry again for the oversight Also the next trip I make will most likely be solo my roommate in Houston came with me this time so it will be significantly easier for me to maneuver Talk to you soon Susan Any luck on the roommate front Do you still want me to talk to Millie Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAshleyEMarynickchaseEcom NRONcom Sent Friday June AM To Scott Susan M Subject Re Random are you here give me a call on if you can take care ashley
